script.title: Good work!
script.body: Our algorithm is adjusting its recommendations based on your interactions and other data such as your watch time, scrolling patterns, and what people with similar profiles liked.

script.title: Great!
script.body:
We use the data we're collecting to make some assumptions.

Beyond this simulation, this can include your age, location, or hobbies, leading to recommendations that may feel eerily specific.

Seeing your data might help you understand how we got there:

script.title: Got it.
script.body:
There can be a mismatch between the signals the algorithm picks up on and what we think they mean.

For more transparency, we'll share the data that goes into these profiles.
This is based on feedback loops between the algorithm's recommendations and your interactions; click to see how we've been weighing your different interactions:
We are experimenting with giving people more control. You can drag the bars above to change what the algorithm values, and then see the data in real time.

script.title: Almost there!
script.body:
We hope that being more transparent gives you better understanding and control.

To give you more choices, we're prototyping a feature where you can select from a number of algorithms designed by other people.
